messages.subject: pre med etc..
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/8/03 10:59:23 AM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/8/03 10:59:23 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Owl pellets are not so fresh and so seem more sanitary. >>

I should mention that if anyone does find some in the wild, it's a good idea
to sanitize them by wrapping them in foil and baking at 200 for an hour.
Kills any potentially harmful bacteria.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
